Bio.bio_text: I am a passionate web developer specialized in frontend technologies, with skills in <react>React</react>, <angular>Angular</angular>, and <next>Next.js</next>. Graduated in Environmental Sciences and Technologies for the Bachelor's degree and later in Global Change Ecology at the University of Trieste, I carry forward a dual passion for computer science and nature.
Bio.current_bio_text: Currently, I work in the IT sector as a Web Developer, contributing to the success of the projects I am part of. I have collaborated on significant projects, using Agile methodologies to ensure efficient and flexible project management.

Education.education_text: Here is an overview of my academic and training path, which has helped shape my skills and passion for the world of web development.

ContactMe.contact_me_text: If you want to get in touch with me, send me a message! I will be happy to answer your questions or discuss any collaboration opportunities.
